mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERINFO(USER_NO, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, USER_EMAIL, USER_PASSWORD, USER_INTYPE, USER_INDATE) VALUES (USERINFO_USER_NO_SEQ.nextval, #{user_name}, #{user_phone}, #{user_email}, #{user_password}, #{user_intype}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select * from userinfo where user_outdate is null order by user_no desc
mapper.update: update userinfo set user_outdate = sysdate where user_no = #{user_no}
